faq.question: What information should I include?
faq.answer: Include your name, area of expertise, and 2-3 notable achievements. The more specific you are, the better the results.

faq.question: Which point of view should I use?
faq.answer: Third person is standard for professional media kits and speaker profiles. First person works better for personal websites and social media.

faq.question: Can I edit the generated bio?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We recommend reviewing and personalizing all AI-generated content to match your unique voice and verify accuracy.

faq.question: What's the best length for a speaker bio?
faq.answer: Medium (100 words) works well for most speaking applications. Short bios are great for quick intros, while long bios suit detailed media kits.
